faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Questions
faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about our tax and accounting services.

items.question: What documents do I need for tax preparation?
items.answer: You'll need W-2s, 1099s, receipts for deductions, prior year tax returns, and any relevant financial statements. We'll provide you with a comprehensive checklist based on your specific situation.

items.question: How much can you save me on taxes?
items.answer: Savings vary based on individual circumstances, but our clients typically save 15-30% on their tax liability through strategic planning and optimization. We guarantee to find every deduction you're entitled to.

items.question: Do you offer year-round support?
items.answer: Yes! Unlike seasonal tax preparers, we provide year-round support for all our clients. This includes tax planning, quarterly check-ins, and immediate assistance with any tax-related questions.

items.question: What if I get audited?
items.answer: All our clients receive audit protection. If you're selected for an audit, we'll represent you throughout the entire process at no additional cost, provided we prepared your return.

items.question: How quickly can you complete my tax return?
items.answer: Most individual returns are completed within 3-5 business days. Business returns typically take 5-7 business days. Rush services are available for urgent situations.
